page.title: 08TRESECH FARM
page.content: Mrs. Roberts of Tresech Farm Keeps sheep and cattle at the moment. She puts 180 acres aside for the animals. She has 330 sheep and 160 cattle. She isn't really interested in modern machinery and just has the basics on her farm apart from an expensive JCB, and she wasn't sure if it was worth the money. Computers are now very popular in farming but Mrs. Roberts thinks it could only help her a little. Altogether Mrs. Roberts has 280 acres of farmland but only 100 acres is used for crops. Apart from keeping crops and animals, Mrs. Roberts grows and sells Christmas trees. Only 1 acre is used for this and it is a very hard job because it is difficult to keep the weeds at bay. She keeps 6000 Christmas trees and has been growing them for 5 years.
